name: Fidget Spinner Classic
description:
Fidget spinners are one of the more bizarre inventions that the internet has helped create, primarily because besides helping people who have fidgeting issues, they have no purpose. Fidget Hand Spinner - a new type of anti-stress toy- a trainer for your fingers. A virtual version of the popular fidget spinner toy that you can play everywhere. Set yourself this hand spinner on your phone and twist as many as you want. Choose any spinner and twist as quickly as possible.
Just use your finger to spin the fidget spinner! Surprise friends, twist together ! Have fun and get relax!
